data.dataAccessDetails: The DSW website does not refer to NGO registration

description.en:
All NGOs wishing to operate in Ghana must first register with the General Registrar's Office, and then apply for NGO status from the Department of Social Welfare (DSW).

There is no database available for search.

"The Social Welfare Department is the regulator of NGOs in Ghana and is therefore mandated to issue certificates of
recognition to organizations to operate as NGOs. " [1]

[1] http://g-lishfoundation.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/HOW-TO-START-AN-NGO-IN-GHANA.pdf
